name: GoMacro Double Chocolate + Peanut Butter Chip Bar
categories: Double Chocolate + Peanut Butter Chip Bar
description:
Enjoy balanced goodness and organic ingredients in the classic chocolate/peanut butter flavour combo.Organic ingredients: brown rice syrup, peanut butter, peanut butter chips (peanut flour, coconut sugar, cocoa butter), salt), protein blend (sprouted brown rice protein, pea protein), puffed brown rice, cacao powder, fair-trade chocolate chips (coconut sugar, cocoa, cocoa butter), coconut sugar, natural flavor, sunﬂower oil, sea salt.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.

        Sustainability
